nodes.text: Esa Parna was a female Human who served the New Republic as a member of the New Republic Intelligence Service.

A female Corellian, Esa Parna was employed as an agent of the New Republic's Intelligence Service during the government's early years. As part of her job, Parna served undercover as Liaison officer Lon Kinnik's chief aide during his assignment on Muunilinst. Serving the liaison delegation to the InterGalactic Banking Clan, she reported back to her superiors at NRI all information of interest. Stationed at High Port Space Center, Parna served her position dutifully during her tenure at the agency.
